alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Estill; Lee; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 4:29PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Estill, northwestern Breathitt, Lee and southern Wolfe Counties through 515 PM EST... At 428 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pinnacle, or near Beattyville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Beattyville, Proctor, Corgleton, Fixer, Lower Buffalo and Standing Rock around 435 PM EST. Fincastle, Airedale, St. Helens, Maloney, Zoe, Whisman, Enoch, Booth, Zachariah and Lone around 440 PM EST. Williba, Vada, Fillmore, Primrose, Flat, Monica, Canyon Falls, Tallega, Athol and Grannie around 445 PM EST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Pence, Bethany, Widecreek, War Creek, Lawson, Lane, Hollonville, Mary, Vortex, Oakdale, Wilhurst, Vancleve, Sewell, Fivemile, Frozen Creek, Paxton, Gentry, Elkatawa, Malaga, Lexie, Jackson, Simpson, Taulbee, Moct, Rock Lick, Keck, Shockey, Rosefork, Noctor, Upper Gilmore, Bays, Mountain Valley, Stevenson, Burkhart, Haginsville, Belknap, Sikes, Wilstacy and Press. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
